MissFortune.name: Miss Fortune
MissFortune.title: the Bounty Hunter
MissFortune.lore:
''The bigger the risk, the bigger the bounty.''
Beauty and danger: There are few who can match Miss Fortune in either. One of Bilgewater's most infamous bounty hunters, she built her legend upon a swathe of bullet-riddled corpses and captured ne'er-do-wells. The booming echoes of her twin pistols in the port city's reeking wharfs and scavenger shanties are sure signs of another warrant from the Bounty Board being settled.
MissFortune.blurb:
''The bigger the risk, the bigger the bounty.''
Beauty and danger: There are few who can match Miss Fortune in either. One of Bilgewater's most infamous bounty hunters, she built her legend upon a swathe of bullet-riddled corpses and captured ...
allytips: Miss Fortune ramps up speed if she hasn't recently taken damage. Avoid getting hit to move very fast.
Use Double Up on the furthest enemy minion if enemy champions are hiding in back; it will bounce to them for lots of damage.
Make sure to utilize Love Tap during Strut's active to maximize the Attack Speed bonus.
enemytips: Miss Fortune's speed boost is removed if she is damaged by an enemy.
Miss Fortune is easy to kill if you can reach her; target her first in team fights.

spells.name: Double Up
spells.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
spells.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot through an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target and {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) damage to the second. Both apply on-hit effects.

If the first target is killed, the second deals 50% increased damage.

spells.name: Strut
spells.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a duration that prolongs with successive Love Taps.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains {{ e5 }} Movement Speed. After another 5 seconds, this bonus increases to {{ e2 }}.

Active: Fully activates Strut's Movement Speed and grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Love Taps prolong the Attack Speed bonus duration by {{ e4 }} seconds (doubled vs. champions).

spells.name: Make It Rain
spells.description: Miss Fortune unleashes a flurry of bullets at a location, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Miss Fortune rains down bullets at a location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds and slowing enemies hit by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Bullet Time
spells.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per wave ({{ e2 }} waves total).

Bullet Time can critically strike for {{ f3 }}% damage.

Total Damage: {{ f2 }}

passive.name: Love Tap
passive.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.
